Definition.WordDefinition: Harvard, ID Zip code(s): 83834 Harvard, IL (city, FIPS 33331) Location: 42.42116 N, 88.61528 W Population (1990): 5975 (2243 housing units) Area: 6.6 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 60033 Harvard, MA Zip code(s): 01451 Harvard, NE (city, FIPS 21345) Location: 40.61932 N, 98.09623 W Population (1990): 976 (466 housing units) Area: 1.8 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 68944

Harvard n 1: a university in Massachusetts [syn: {Harvard University}] 2: American philanthropist who left his library and half his estate to the Massachusetts college that now bears his name (1607-1638) [syn: {John Harvard}]
